name: Video Merger
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Merges multiple video files. Offers a fast (stream copy) mode using FFmpeg and a compatible (re-encode) mode.

properties.label: Video List Variable
properties.description: Payload variable containing a list of full video file paths.

properties.label: Output Folder
properties.description: The folder where the merged video will be saved.

properties.label: Output Filename (without extension)
properties.description: The name for the final merged video file.

properties.label: Merge Method
properties.description: Fast mode requires FFmpeg and all videos to have the same properties. Compatible mode is slower but more flexible.

output_schema.name: data.merged_video_path
output_schema.description: The full local path to the newly created merged video file.
